Home.title: ОДИН КЛІК ДЛЯ ЗАХИСТУ АКТИВІВ
Home.description: Поринь у мистецтво активів, де інноваційні блокчейн-технології поєднуються з фінансовою експертизою.

beepsblog.title: Beepsblog
beepsblog.description: A blog platform with Google authentication and Firebase backend, deployed on Netlify.

beepsSteamHelper.title: Beeps Steam Helper
beepsSteamHelper.description: A full-stack app for Steam game recommendations with Steam authentication, Steam API, OpenAI API integration, and tests (Jest, Vitest).
beepsSteamHelper.technologies: React, NestJS, Steam API, OpenAI API, Jest, PostgreSQL, Redis, TailwindCSS

kinobratva.title: Kinobratva
kinobratva.description: A movie website with IMDB API integration, deployed on Netlify.

About.title: About Me
About.description: I’m a JavaScript developer passionate about building modern web applications. I have experience with React, NestJS, TypeScript, and other technologies.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Reach out to me via email or social media.
